p: The expression of the HERV elements W E1 and FRD was monitored by IHC in human colorectal adenocarcinoma paraffin sections. Both elements were found to be overexpressed in tumors as compared to the normal colon tissues. Fig.Â 1 shows that the expression of both viral traces was localized to the villi, intervillar regions and the crypts of the large intestine, but confined to the tumor areas.
